document.heading: Omnibus Police Reform Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-160, the “Omnibus Police Reform Amendment Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-118, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 1, 2000, and April 3, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-334 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-160 became effective on October 4, 2000.
